CustomField.description: The calculated Total Perm Fee that applies to the Assignment
CustomField.formula: CASE( Text(tc9_et__Perm_Fee_Based_On__c), "Flat Fee", tc9_et__Perm_Flat_Fee_Amount__c, "Percentage of Base Salary", tc9_et__Base_Salary__c * (tc9_et__Perm_Invoice_Rate__c/100), "Percentage of Total Salary Package", if( isblank(tc9_et__Total_Salary_Package_Override__c), tc9_et__Total_Salary_Package__c * (tc9_et__Perm_Invoice_Rate__c/100), tc9_et__Total_Salary_Package_Override__c * (tc9_et__Perm_Invoice_Rate__c/100) ) ,0 )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The calculated Total Perm Fee that applies to the Assignment
CustomField.label: Total Perm Fee
